query: SELECT a.id, a.name, a.hospitalId, h.name as hospitalName FROM areas a JOIN hospitals h ON a.hospitalId = h.id WHERE a.name LIKE '%Southern Cross%' OR a.hospitalId = (SELECT hospitalId FROM areas WHERE id = 210038)
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3xdfM6hBeGk8i8i.5dbeac8a2102 --database DxAqoJ22pGdNTCdjRs8uzu --execute SELECT a.id, a.name, a.hospitalId, h.name as hospitalName FROM areas a JOIN hospitals h ON a.hospitalId = h.id WHERE a.name LIKE '%Southern Cross%' OR a.hospitalId = (SELECT hospitalId FROM areas WHERE id = 210038)
